publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-8123 John Wilson: North Lanarkshire’s Gaelic Initiative Awards 2011—That the Parliament congratulates North Lanarkshire Council on recognising the excellent work being done throughout North Lanarkshire in relation to the Gaelic medium by holding the Gaelic Initiative Awards on Friday 4 March 2011; congratulates those groups that were honoured at the awards ceremony, which included Orain Luaidh, Foram Lannraig A’ Tuath, Language Classes, Sradagan, Lorg, Feis, Playsceme, Cumbernauld Gaelic Choir, Camanachd Cearcall Lannraig A’ Tuath, Cearcall Family Learning Group, Condorrat Primary School’s Gaelic Unit, Ulpan Classes, Croilegean Bogha Frois and Croilegean Isrannan; further congratulates those groups that provided the entertainment of music and singing on the night, and joins in wishing all North Lanarkshire-based Gaelic initiatives every future success.

S3M-8123 North Lanarkshire’s Gaelic Initiative Awards 2011 (lodged on 9 March 2011) Jamie Hepburn*, Dave Thompson*, Kenneth Gibson*, Stewart Maxwell*, Des McNulty*, Sandra White*, Rob Gibson*, Christina McKelvie*, Bill Kidd*

S3M-8123 John Wilson: North Lanarkshire’s Gaelic Initiative Awards 2011—That the Parliament congratulates North Lanarkshire Council on recognising the excellent work being done throughout North Lanarkshire in relation to the Gaelic medium by holding the Gaelic Initiative Awards on Friday 4 March 2011; congratulates those groups that were honoured at the awards ceremony, which included Orain Luaidh, Foram Lannraig A’ Tuath, Language Classes, Sradagan, Lorg, Feis, Playsceme, Cumbernauld Gaelic Choir, Camanachd Cearcall Lannraig A’ Tuath, Cearcall Family Learning Group, Condorrat Primary School’s Gaelic Unit, Ulpan Classes, Croilegean Bogha Frois and Croilegean Isrannan; further congratulates those groups that provided the entertainment of music and singing on the night, and joins in wishing all North Lanarkshire-based Gaelic initiatives every future success. Supported by: Jamie Hepburn, Dave Thompson, Kenneth Gibson, Stewart Maxwell, Des McNulty, Sandra White, Rob Gibson, Christina McKelvie, Bill Kidd, Bob Doris*, Karen Whitefield*
